content: the **everyday wrap** is very easy to knit and surprisingly warm… enough to cut the chill at a restaurant or party be sure to knit it in your very favorite and most flattering color and you will reach for it often *finished measurements* flat width at neck 17 / 43 cm width at bottom 34 / 86 cm length 13 / 33 cm **materials** *yarn* 400 yds / 366 m lace to sport weight yarn that gets gauge if adding optional ruffle please buy an extra 100 yds / 92 m of yarn **shown in** two strands held together ​​​​​​​habu n-52 68% kid mohair 32% nylon 311 yds per 0 5 oz ball 2 balls in tea and habu ​​​​​​​a-171 100% cashmere 187 yds per 0 5 oz ball 2 balls in grey *also recommended* habu a-32b - 60% mohair 40% silk 187 yds per 0 5 oz ball 2 balls and ​​​​​​​shibui silk cloud - 60% mohair 40% silk 330 yds per 25g skein 2 skeins *needles* us 8/5 mm or us 9/5 5 mm change needle size if necessary to obtain correct gauge
